title: SOLD: 1890 Harper's Weekly - Baseball HOF Woodcuts (5)
author: bcbgcbrcb

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1890 Harper's Weekly - Baseball HOF Woodcuts (5)
posts.post_content:
Good Evening, Collectors:

Up for sale tonight is a very scarce group of 5 - 1890 Harper's Weekly Baseball Player Woodcuts including HOF'ers: Roger Connor, Tim Keefe, Buck Ewing, Sam Thompson & Mickey Welch. Please review scans of the woodcuts for condition details. Sale price on this lot is $SOLD dlvd. and the first person to e-mail me and state "I'll take them" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url]
